original_text: He was in the world, and though the world was made through him, the world did not recognize him.
korean_text: 그가 세상에 계셨으며 세상은 그로 말미암아 지은 바 되었으되 세상이 그를 알지 못하였고

sentences.original_text: and though the world was made through him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 비록 세상이 그를 통하여 만들어졌지만

sentences.original_text: the world did not recognize him
